post.body: Havana, drinking Cuba Libre.
Well, I just hope people give you more sympathy than you gave me.
I don't think @luke_harrison should be going out later if he's skived off work. No pudding if you don't eat your dinner...
Oh no – you have the lurgy. Never mind; you'll feel better in about three weeks or so.
The pics of your allottment look amazing – what a master grower!
I like the way your jumper matches your laptop bag today.
Body Pump was great – will no doubt be ready for bed by lunchtime though.
Great the #OBH has a Twitter account!
Thx – anytime will be great! Good luck with it.
Would you let me know how your WP upgrade goes and if there are any issues to be aware of before I have a go? Cheers!
that comes later...
Just how DID you tweet from the air, anyway?
Thx for the good luck msg. You'll see the results soon. I'm nervous / excited in equal measure.
Thanks for the info. I really appreciate it.
Can't find your qik video... Jude pleased or not?
Welcome to Twitter, Geoff. @lindabroughton 's blog post has persuaded a few new people to join... #OBH
Tom and Camilla.
although, to be fair, Rachel is the better dancer.
Tom will win. I'd put money on it.
WRONG!
@richardsproject Nah - vote for Tom. He's got way more charisma. And he's cuter.
Who are you voting for on SCD? ;-)
Our similiarities just ended, right there.
SNOOKER???!!
What about a tweet? How much for that?
Right – off the the gym (for the second time today). I'll be fit as a flea by the weekend.
It's sad, I know – but I love Google AdWords. It's just so damn clever.
Nobody wants a compliment and I have so much love to give today. I'm overflowing with the milk of human kindness...
I am complimenting everybody I meet today. Tweet me if you'd like a piece of the action.
Doing keyword research for a new client. It's amazing how many variations there are of most products.
Brrr. Too cold to be stood at a bus stop at 6:15, going to the gym. All just to keep @ntceline company.
50 Extremely Useful And Powerful CSS Tools http://ff.im/-gyjs
RT @Thehodge: Leeds Twitterers - register for the first newsletter and they will send you a free dayrider + plant a tree http://bit.ly/ZB6g
I have "All I Want For Christmas" tune going round and round in my head. Agghhh.
Sitting by a roaring coal fire; the perfect place to be in winter. http://snipurl.com/7qzfz
So much congestion in Manchester. Why oh why vote against the congestion charge?
Amazing - the sun is shining on BOTH sides of the Pennines.
Enjoying my role as assistant director / executive producer / gaffer / spark / best boy / key grip / runner on today's videoshoot.
Precocious Baby Starts Twittering from the Womb http://ff.im/-ih2m
RT @jrward: I've wasted 25,290 Seconds or 422 Minutes or 7.03 Hours or 0.29 Days with 843 Tweets on Twitter! {Actually, NOT a waste.}
I've wasted 25,290 Seconds or 422 Minutes or 7.03 Hours or 0.29 Days with 843 Tweets on Twitter! http://tweetwasters.com
Why so difficult to get to sleep the night before a big day? Being filmed tomorrow for my new site and really don't want bags under my eyes.
Now being followed by GMcQueen, within minutes of my tweet about the show. Brilliant!
Watching Peter Kay's Britain's Got the Pop Factor... Spookily accurate and brilliantly funny.
A lot of Brits don't understand search engines http://ff.im/-ibzs
Patience – A True Twitter Virtue http://ff.im/-ibzq
Building a Facebook Page (for business)
RT @Thehodge: gavin and stacy is a fantastic program < +1
Creating Space for YOUR customer on Twitter http://ff.im/-hyWO
Nipping into town (in the rain) to have my haircut ready for videoshoot on Monday.
Proper TV on your iPhone with Livestation http://ff.im/-mmom
Starting Christmas shopping. Yawn. Time for a coffee and a muffin methinks.
RT @orvet: New Years Resolution - Get Noded in '09 http://bit.ly/bTmC
Thoughts on Twitter: http://tinyurl.com/8vqhom
Welcome to Twitter @richardsproject !
Loving first page bid estimates in AdWords Editor 7. Saving me lots of time.
I've booked for Think Visibility in Leeds on 7 March. I think you should too. And it's only £30! www.thinkvisibility.com #thinkvisibility
Building AdWords campaign for a new client. Learning all about industrial furnaces.
A slice of cold Pizza Hut has got to be one of the best breakfast treats.
